game.name: 盖亚冥想曲·时之守望者Ⅰ
game.shortDescription: "Gaia Meditation: Watcher I" is an independent multi-viewpoint visual novel game presented in full animation. Xiaotian, a seemingly ordinary teenager, met Dean, a young angel who came through space in the museum. His fate began to tear.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Gaia Meditation: Watcher I" is an independent multi-viewpoint visual novel game presented in full animation. Xiaotian, a seemingly ordinary teenager, met Dean, a young angel who came through space in the museum. His fate began to tear.
